text: Creoleon is a genus of antlions (neuropteran insects in the family Myrmeleontidae) in the subfamily Myrmeleontinae. It is an extant genus but there is at least one fossil species. == References == == External links == * * * * Creoleon at insectoid.info Category:Myrmeleontinae Category:Myrmeleontidae genera
title: Creoleon
